name: ONWARD (itch)
description:
With the help of light, a little monk woke up from his world, a world of Dunhuang murals. In the face of this world full of unknowns and temptations, he began his practice with shadow and light always accompanied him. Whether can he find the meaning of his journey? 

Features:
  • Innovative gameplay
  • Unique art style
  • Interesting levels and puzzles

（The version only contains 2 levels，and all levels that are available now are designed for showing gameplay. A version with a more complete gaming experience is under development. ）
